questions.textEn: What is your favorite subject at school?
questions.textJa: 学校で一番好きな教科は何ですか？
questions.answerEn: I like English because I want to travel abroad someday.
questions.answerJa: いつか海外旅行に行きたいので英語が好きです。
questions.followUpEn: Do you like studying languages?
questions.followUpJa: 言語を勉強するのは好きですか？

questions.textEn: Do you belong to any club activities?
questions.textJa: 部活動には入っていますか？
questions.answerEn: Yes, I'm in the basketball club. We practice very hard.
questions.answerJa: はい、バスケ部に入っています。練習はとてもハードです。
questions.followUpEn: How often do you practice?
questions.followUpJa: どのくらいの頻度で練習しますか？

questions.textEn: What is the best part of your school day?
questions.textJa: 学校生活の中で一番好きな時間はいつですか？
questions.answerEn: Lunch time is the best because I can talk with my friends.
questions.answerJa: 友達と話せるのでお昼休みが一番好きです。
questions.followUpEn: Who do you usually eat lunch with?
questions.followUpJa: たいてい誰とお昼を食べますか？

questions.textEn: Which teacher do you like the most?
questions.textJa: 一番好きな先生は誰ですか？
questions.answerEn: I like Mr. Tanaka because his classes are very funny.
questions.answerJa: 田中先生が好きです、授業がとても面白いからです。
questions.followUpEn: What subject does he teach?
questions.followUpJa: 彼は何の教科を教えていますか？

questions.textEn: How do you get to school?
questions.textJa: どうやって通学していますか？
questions.answerEn: I go to school by bike. It takes about 15 minutes.
questions.answerJa: 自転車で通っています。15分くらいかかります。
questions.followUpEn: Is your school far from your house?
questions.followUpJa: 学校は家から遠いですか？

questions.textEn: What do you usually do on weekends?
questions.textJa: 週末はたいてい何をしていますか？
questions.answerEn: I usually play video games with my friends online.
questions.answerJa: たいてい友達とオンラインでゲームをします。
questions.followUpEn: What game is popular right now?
questions.followUpJa: 今どんなゲームが人気ですか？

questions.textEn: Do you prefer watching movies or reading books?
questions.textJa: 映画を見るのと読書、どっちが好きですか？
questions.answerEn: I prefer movies because I like exciting stories.
questions.answerJa: ワクワクする物語が好きなので映画の方が好きです。
questions.followUpEn: What is the best movie you've ever seen?
questions.followUpJa: 今まで見た中で一番良かった映画は何ですか？

questions.textEn: What is your favorite YouTuber?
questions.textJa: 好きなYouTuberは誰ですか？
questions.answerEn: I like Hikakin. His videos are very funny and kind.
questions.answerJa: ヒカキンが好きです。彼の動画はとても面白くて優しいです。
questions.followUpEn: Do you watch YouTube every day?
questions.followUpJa: YouTubeは毎日見ますか？

questions.textEn: Do you play any musical instruments?
questions.textJa: 何か楽器は演奏しますか？
questions.answerEn: Yes, I play the guitar. I want to start a band.
questions.answerJa: はい、ギターを弾きます。バンドを組みたいです。
questions.followUpEn: What kind of music do you like?
questions.followUpJa: どんな音楽が好きですか？

questions.textEn: Do you like karaoke?
questions.textJa: カラオケは好きですか？
questions.answerEn: Yes! I go to karaoke with my friends once a month.
questions.answerJa: はい！月に一回友達とカラオケに行きます。
questions.followUpEn: What song do you always sing?
questions.followUpJa: いつも歌う曲は何ですか？

questions.textEn: What is your favorite food?
questions.textJa: 一番好きな食べ物は何ですか？
questions.answerEn: I love Sushi, especially Salmon.
questions.answerJa: お寿司、特にサーモンが大好きです。
questions.followUpEn: Can you eat Wasabi?
questions.followUpJa: ワサビは食べられますか？

questions.textEn: Do you like sweets? What is your favorite?
questions.textJa: 甘いものは好きですか？何が一番好きですか？
questions.answerEn: Yes! I love chocolate and ice cream.
questions.answerJa: はい！チョコとアイスが大好きです。
questions.followUpEn: Do you prefer chocolate or vanilla?
questions.followUpJa: チョコとバニラどっちが好きですか？

questions.textEn: Can you cook? What can you make?
questions.textJa: 料理はできますか？何が作れますか？
questions.answerEn: I can make simple dishes like fried eggs and curry.
questions.answerJa: 目玉焼きやカレーのような簡単な料理なら作れます。
questions.followUpEn: Who cooks dinner in your family?
questions.followUpJa: 家族の中で誰が夕食を作りますか？

questions.textEn: Do you prefer Japanese food or Western food?
questions.textJa: 和食と洋食、どっちが好きですか？
questions.answerEn: I prefer Japanese food because I love rice.
questions.answerJa: お米が大好きなので和食の方が好きです。
questions.followUpEn: What did you eat for breakfast today?
questions.followUpJa: 今日の朝ごはんは何を食べましたか？

questions.textEn: What is your favorite school lunch menu?
questions.textJa: 給食で一番好きなメニューは何ですか？
questions.answerEn: I love the fried bread (Age-pan) days!
questions.answerJa: 揚げパンの日が大好きです！
questions.followUpEn: Is school lunch delicious?
questions.followUpJa: 給食は美味しいですか？

questions.textEn: Where do you want to travel someday?
questions.textJa: いつか旅行してみたい場所はどこですか？
questions.answerEn: I want to go to America to see a MLB game.
questions.answerJa: メジャーリーグの試合を見るためにアメリカに行きたいです。
questions.followUpEn: Are you a baseball fan?
questions.followUpJa: 野球ファンですか？

questions.textEn: Have you ever been abroad?
questions.textJa: 海外に行ったことはありますか？
questions.answerEn: No, I haven't. I want to get a passport soon.
questions.answerJa: いいえ、ありません。早くパスポートを取りたいです。
questions.followUpEn: Where is the first place you want to go?
questions.followUpJa: 最初に行きたい場所はどこですか？

questions.textEn: Do you like hot springs (Onsen)?
questions.textJa: 温泉は好きですか？
questions.answerEn: Yes, I love Onsen. It's very relaxing.
questions.answerJa: はい、温泉は大好きです。とてもリラックスできます。
questions.followUpEn: Do you prefer indoor or outdoor baths?
questions.followUpJa: 内風呂と露天風呂、どっちが好きですか？

questions.textEn: What do you like to do during summer vacation?
questions.textJa: 夏休みは何をするのが好きですか？
questions.answerEn: I like to go camping with my family.
questions.answerJa: 家族とキャンプに行くのが好きです。
questions.followUpEn: Do you like BBQ?
questions.followUpJa: バーベキューは好きですか？

questions.textEn: Do you prefer the sea or the mountains?
questions.textJa: 海と山、どっちが好きですか？
questions.answerEn: I prefer the sea because I like swimming.
questions.answerJa: 泳ぐのが好きなので海の方が好きです。
questions.followUpEn: Can you swim well?
questions.followUpJa: 泳ぐのは得意ですか？

questions.textEn: What do you want to be in the future?
questions.textJa: 将来何になりたいですか？
questions.answerEn: I want to be a doctor because I want to help people.
questions.answerJa: 人を助けたいので医者になりたいです。
questions.followUpEn: Do you need to study hard to be a doctor?
questions.followUpJa: 医者になるには一生懸命勉強しないといけませんか？

questions.textEn: Do you want to live in Japan or abroad?
questions.textJa: 日本に住みたいですか、それとも海外に住みたいですか？
questions.answerEn: I want to live in Japan near my family.
questions.answerJa: 家族の近くにいたいので日本に住みたいです。
questions.followUpEn: Where in Japan do you want to live?
questions.followUpJa: 日本のどこに住みたいですか？

questions.textEn: Do you want to get married in the future?
questions.textJa: 将来結婚したいですか？
questions.answerEn: Yes, I want to have a happy family.
questions.answerJa: はい、幸せな家庭を持ちたいです。
questions.followUpEn: How many children do you want?
questions.followUpJa: 子供は何人欲しいですか？

questions.textEn: If you could start a business, what would it be?
questions.textJa: もしお店や会社を始めるとしたら、何がいいですか？
questions.answerEn: I would open a stylish cafe.
questions.answerJa: おしゃれなカフェを開きたいです。
questions.followUpEn: What kind of food would you serve?
questions.followUpJa: どんな食べ物を出しますか？

questions.textEn: What is your dream?
questions.textJa: あなたの夢は何ですか？
questions.answerEn: My dream is to travel around the world.
questions.answerJa: 私の夢は世界一周旅行をすることです。
questions.followUpEn: How long would that take?
questions.followUpJa: それにはどのくらい時間がかかりそうですか？

questions.textEn: Which season do you like the best?
questions.textJa: どの季節が一番好きですか？
questions.answerEn: I like spring because of the cherry blossoms.
questions.answerJa: 桜があるので春が好きです。
questions.followUpEn: Do you have hay fever (Kafun-sho)?
questions.followUpJa: 花粉症ですか？

questions.textEn: Do you like winter sports?
questions.textJa: ウィンタースポーツは好きですか？
questions.answerEn: Yes, I go snowboarding every year.
questions.answerJa: はい、毎年スノボに行きます。
questions.followUpEn: Are you good at it?
questions.followUpJa: 得意ですか？

questions.textEn: What is your favorite holiday?
questions.textJa: 一番好きな祝日・イベントは何ですか？
questions.answerEn: I like Christmas because I get presents.
questions.answerJa: プレゼントがもらえるのでクリスマスが好きです。
questions.followUpEn: What do you want for Christmas this year?
questions.followUpJa: 今年のクリスマスは何が欲しいですか？

questions.textEn: Do you like hot weather or cold weather?
questions.textJa: 暑いのと寒いの、どっちが好きですか？
questions.answerEn: I prefer cold weather because I can wear warm clothes.
questions.answerJa: 暖かい服を着られるので寒い方が好きです。
questions.followUpEn: Do you like snow?
questions.followUpJa: 雪は好きですか？

questions.textEn: What do you eat on New Year's Day?
questions.textJa: お正月には何を食べますか？
questions.answerEn: I eat Osechi and Mochi (rice cakes).
questions.answerJa: おせちとお餅を食べます。
questions.followUpEn: How many rice cakes did you eat?
questions.followUpJa: お餅は何個食べましたか？

questions.textEn: What smartphone do you use?
questions.textJa: どんなスマホを使っていますか？
questions.answerEn: I use an iPhone. It's very easy to use.
questions.answerJa: iPhoneを使っています。とても使いやすいです。
questions.followUpEn: What is your favorite app?
questions.followUpJa: 一番好きなアプリは何ですか？

questions.textEn: Do you use SNS? Which one?
questions.textJa: SNSは使いますか？どれですか？
questions.answerEn: I use Instagram to see my friends' photos.
questions.answerJa: 友達の写真を見るためにインスタグラムを使っています。
questions.followUpEn: Do you post photos often?
questions.followUpJa: よく写真を投稿しますか？

questions.textEn: Do you think AI is useful?
questions.textJa: AIは便利だと思いますか？
questions.answerEn: Yes, I use AI to help with my homework sometimes.
questions.answerJa: はい、時々宿題を手伝ってもらうためにAIを使います。
questions.followUpEn: Is it difficult to use?
questions.followUpJa: 使うのは難しいですか？

questions.textEn: Do you prefer texting or calling?
questions.textJa: LINE（メッセージ）と電話、どっちが好きですか？
questions.answerEn: I prefer texting because I can reply anytime.
questions.answerJa: いつでも返信できるのでメッセージの方が好きです。
questions.followUpEn: Do you use emojis?
questions.followUpJa: 絵文字は使いますか？

questions.textEn: How many hours a day do you use your phone?
questions.textJa: 1日何時間くらいスマホを使いますか？
questions.answerEn: I use it for about 3 hours. Maybe too much!
questions.answerJa: 3時間くらい使います。たぶん使いすぎです！
questions.followUpEn: What do you do on your phone?
questions.followUpJa: スマホで何をしていますか？

questions.textEn: If you had a million yen, what would you buy?
questions.textJa: もし100万円あったら、何を買いますか？
questions.answerEn: I would buy a new gaming PC.
questions.answerJa: 新しいゲーミングPCを買います。
questions.followUpEn: What game would you play first?
questions.followUpJa: 最初に何のゲームをしますか？

questions.textEn: If you could have a superpower, what would it be?
questions.textJa: もし超能力が使えるなら、どんな力がいいですか？
questions.answerEn: I want to be able to fly so I can go anywhere.
questions.answerJa: どこへでも行けるように空を飛べるようになりたいです。
questions.followUpEn: Where would you fly to now?
questions.followUpJa: 今どこに飛んで行きたいですか？

questions.textEn: If you were an animal, what would you be?
questions.textJa: もし動物になるとしたら、何になりますか？
questions.answerEn: I would be a cat so I can sleep all day.
questions.answerJa: 一日中寝ていられるので猫になりたいです。
questions.followUpEn: Do you like sleeping?
questions.followUpJa: 寝るのは好きですか？

questions.textEn: If you could meet a historical person, who would it be?
questions.textJa: もし歴史上の人物に会えるなら、誰がいいですか？
questions.answerEn: I would meet Oda Nobunaga.
questions.answerJa: 織田信長に会ってみたいです。
questions.followUpEn: What would you ask him?
questions.followUpJa: 彼に何を聞いてみたいですか？

questions.textEn: If you could live anywhere in the world, where would it be?
questions.textJa: もし世界のどこにでも住めるとしたら、どこがいいですか？
questions.answerEn: I would live in Hawaii because the weather is nice.
questions.answerJa: 天気がいいのでハワイに住みたいです。
questions.followUpEn: Have you been to Hawaii?
questions.followUpJa: ハワイに行ったことはありますか？
